comments.creator: brandon.beaumia@gmail.com
comments.author: brandon.beaumia@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:9.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/9.0.1
Build ID: 20111220165912

Steps to reproduce:

Type anything in the awesomebar that results in suggestions. Hit Shift + Up arrow to highlight everything in the bar.


Actual results:

Shift + Up highlights the bottom result of the suggestion list.


Expected results:

The text that's been inputted should be highlighted to conform with OS X. Arrows alone work fine for awesomebar: shift + arrows can be used for text selection.
